availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy R. Johnson Clements on June 11, 1839 in Union County. Father of Susan Ann Clements, George L. Clements, Baldwin Clements, Sallie H. Clements, Aaron W Clements, Mary F. Clements, Lucy G. Clements, Bettie G. Clements, and Robert L. Clements. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Employed Benjamin Berry as a laborer in Union County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
